name: pnp-list-formatting-commandbar-display-edit-in-gridview
title: Display Edit in Grid View Button in the Command Bar
shortDescription: In the Document Library, the [Edit in grid view] button is hidden under the [...] button. This sample demonstrates displaying the [Edit in grid view] button on the command bar.
longDescription: In the Document Library, the [Edit in grid view] button is hidden under the [...] button. This sample demonstrates displaying the [Edit in grid view] button on the command bar.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
